        public boolean backtrackingUtil(Piece pieceBT,
                                Board boardBT)
        Second part of the backtracking algorithm
        Parameters:
        pieceBT - the currentpiece you are gonna use to iterate through its legal movements
        boardBT - the board where the piece is
        Returns:
        Returns true if it has a solution, false otherwise.

      • backtracking

        public boolean backtracking()
        The caller function and the first part of the backtracking algorithm used to check if a problem has a solution.
        Returns:
        Returns true if it does have a solution, false otherwise
